table.name: gtm_structure
table.description: Define possible structures for the Trade Item. These structures would vary by trade direction, product classification type, product classification code, supplier and/or lot/batch

columns.name: GTM_STRUCTURE_GID
columns.description: GTM_STRUCTURE_GID contains the unique identifier for the trade item structure.

columns.name: GTM_STRUCTURE_XID
columns.description: GTM_STRUCTURE_XID contains the XID unique identifier for the trade item structure.

columns.name: GTM_STRUCTURE_NAME
columns.description: GTM_STRUCTURE_NAME contains text for the name of the trade item structure

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: DESCRIPTION contains text for the description of the trade item structure

columns.name: IS_ACTIVE
columns.description: When N, indicates trade item structure is inactive and should not be used by the algorithm.

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The Effective Date of this trade item structure

columns.name: EXPIRATION_DATE
columns.description: The Expiration Date of this trade item structure

columns.name: SOURCE
columns.description: source of this trade item structure. Its it created within GTM or imported from out system.

columns.name: ITEM_GID
columns.description: Trade Item ID, this represents the trade item for which this structure is defined.

columns.name: TRADE_DIRECTION
columns.description: Trade Direction. Used to define import, export or both specific structure

columns.name: GTM_PROD_CLASS_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Product Classification Type ID Used to define product classification type specific structure

columns.name: DEFAULT_COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN
columns.description: Default country of origin. Any component that doesn?t have country of origin specified will use this value as country of origin

columns.name: INVENTORY_ORGANIZATION_GID
columns.description: Identifies the inventory organization corresponding to the item structure.

columns.name: PARTNER_GID
columns.description: Identifies the partner corresponding to the item structure.

columns.name: PARTNER_SITE_GID
columns.description: Identifies the partner site corresponding to the item structure.

columns.name: ALTERNATE_DESIGNATOR
columns.description: This field links parent and child Bill of Material and helps to identify alternate Bill of Material.

columns.name: CLASSIFICATION_CODE
columns.description: Classification code for an item.
